description:
Umibozu leaves but Kagura decides to stay in Edo. Seeing her friends sitting pensively in the Otose Snack house, Kagura, feeling mischievous, spies on the bar from the outside. But soon her friends forget about their loneliness and move on to different topics: Gintoki`s crotch, beautiful women doctors, and the personalities of the female characters on the show… Soon talk centers on who will be the new heroine to fill in the Odd Jobs roster. Sachan, Otae, and Catherine begin a fierce battle over the slot. Who will the men choose to be the next heroine…?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Character wa Sillhouette dake Dokusha ni Miwake ga Tsuku You ni Agakiwakeyou
Make Characters So Anybody Can Tell Who They Are by Just Their Silhouettes
Zeichnet Charaktere so, dass man sie anhand ihrer Silhouetten erkennen kann!
キャラクターはシルエットだけで読者に見分けがつくように描き分けよう
